title: Account Manager
content:
Media.Monks Capital is a new age/new era digital advertising and marketing services company, leading the way in building integrated teams to bring a full suite of best in class offerings to world renowned brands.  We accomplish amazing work through our people, by remaining agile  and in real-time partnership with our clients.  We’re bringing together creative and technology deeply rooted in innovation with a disruptive model that breaks down barriers. If you’re intrigued, read on as we may have an interesting match for you. 
 
About the opportunity: 
 
A mission critical role for Media.Monks is the Embedded Marketing Account Manager, who helps our busy client stay on track. This is a role where we need a detail-oriented person with great people skills to help bring our clients strategy to life. We’re looking for someone who can operate as the lead point of contact for any and all matters specific to your accounts, and who will be responsible for defining and delivering marketing initiatives.  
 
Our ideal candidate is a fast and flexible go-getter who jumps on new opportunities, with a natural aptitude for collaboration and organisation. 
 
Role & Responsibilities:

Partner with MediaMonks colleagues to deliver integrated solutions from campaign inception through completion
Help lead the brand and clients across multiple integrated touchpoints, as they look to continue to push the boundaries of creative deliverables. 
Prepare creative briefs, learning agendas, and client presentations with minimal supervision; lead client calls with confidence and maintain control of the conversation - getting back on track if things derail
Build a positive working relationship of the partner agencies active on the business
Develop strong relationships with both our clients and your counterparts on the Creative, Strategy, Production, and Media teams (Mid-Senior level)
Be intimately familiar with the client’s brand, product, market conditions, and competitors - share intel, creative, articles, etc with your teams. Immerse yourself in the essential dynamics, strategies, and drivers of your client’s business
Coach and inspire the growth and development of junior agency staff via providing consistent feedback, training, and growth opportunities
Lead collaboration on analytics insights and reporting, working with internal MediaMonks and external analytics teams. Lead reporting and analyzing data and preparing reporting presentations..
Engage in meaningful discussions with clients and partners to take actions to improve their experience and process working with MediaMonks
Champion the agency perspective convincingly with clients. Is persuasive and articulate when communicating work and ideas. Challenge poor client feedback. 
Demonstrate a passion for the agency, the work, and the client’s business.
Lead all productions within your area of responsibility; participate in production conversations and support the Creative and Production teams in any way possible.
Ensure all work is accurate, reflects client comments, meets brand standards, and is on strategy
Stay on top of all aspects of a project, always able to explain the status, timing implications, and budget implications at each step. Always be two steps ahead on your projects.

 
Requirements:

Experience working at an advertising agency, marketing firm, client side, or start-up


Experience managing a creative process with a base knowledge of production
Experience with data and analytics and eagerness to lean into this side of the business
Strong interpersonal skills to foster optimal department and client relationships
Ability to head off potential conflicts and problems before they materialise, and have strong problem-solving skills
About Media.Monks:
Media.Monks is the purely digital operating brand of S4Capital plc that connects 8,600+ digital natives across one global team. We are united by a mission to shift industries forward and pave the path towards ambitious outcomes so our clients and our people can realize their full potential for growth. Our unified model combines solutions in media, data, social, platforms, studio, experience, brand and technology services to help our clients continuously reinvent themselves throughout increasingly rapid cycles of disruption. Our efforts to shape culture, build innovative technologies and unlock the future of growth have earned recognition from numerous esteemed panels: we maintain a constant presence on Adweek’s Fastest Growing lists (2019-22), regular recognition at Cannes Lions, inclusion in AdExchanger’s Programmatic Power Players (2020-23), the title of Webby Production Company of the Year (2021-23), a record number of FWAs, and have earned a spot on Newsweek’s Top 100 Global Most Loved Workplaces 2023. Together, these achievements solidify our experience in digital innovation, excellence in craft, and commitment to personal growth.
While we continue to grow our teams, please be mindful of fraudulent job postings and recruiting activities that may use our company name and information. Please be mindful to protect your personal information, especially your national identification number, and bank account information during a recruiting process. While Media.Monks may reach out to potential candidates via LinkedIn, we will always ask applicants to apply through our website (https://media.monks.com/careers) and will never ask for payment or bank account information during the recruitment process.
Disclaimer: 


Responsible for resourcing and implementing security controls for your teams processes and systems


Responsible that all your personnel apply information security in accordance with the established information security policy

demographic_questions.description:
At Media.Monks, we believe in fostering an environment where a diversity of perspectives can thrive. We proactively work to design hiring processes that promote equity and inclusion while mitigating bias. We celebrate diversity and are committed to building a team that reflects the communities we serve. We welcome and encourage qualified applicants, from all backgrounds, who are excited to contribute to our mission. 

As a step in strengthening our hiring process, we invite you to voluntarily provide information that will help inform and improve our inclusion efforts.

As a reminder, answering this question is entirely voluntary. Your response will remain confidential and intended solely for the purpose of improving our hiring process; and will not, in any way, be associated with your specific application or be used in the hiring decision.

questions.label: Have you been referred by an employee of Media.Monks? If that is the case, please state their name + last name.
Do you have the right to work in Dublin/ the EU?
